item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Koji - New Haven

Late night sushi bar Koji has recently opened on Temple St. in downtown New Haven. The bar offers specialty cocktails, saki, beer and wine as well as an exciting food menu that offers more than just sushi. Some of you may be familiar with their sister venue in Hartford. Come along and check out the latest addition to New Haven's bar scene. This is our first visit to this location and they've offered a lot of great specials, so let's show up in Full force!

The Manager Darren has very generously offered NHC members the following specials for the evening:

Sake: Sho Chiku Bai $3

Beer:
Kirin Light 12oz, Miller Lite, and Bud Light are $3
Sapporo 16oz for $4.

Wine: $4 by the glass
Malbec, Cabernet, Merlot, Pinot Noir
Torrontes, Chardonnay, Pinot Grigio, Riesling, Sauv Blanc

Martinis: $5
Apple, Cosmo, Asian Persuasion, Lychee & Lemon Drop

Appetizers:
Crab cakes – fresh crab meat cylinder & a deconstructed crab cake napoleon #3
California roll – Crab, Cucumber & avocado $3
2 Assembled Koji Nachos – Chopped Ahi Tuna, seaweed salad, Wasabi guacamole and a drizzle of our spicy aioli $3
KFC - Our famous!! Koji fried chicken so goo d it’s addictive - served with Kimchee sauce $3
Half Dore Rolls – Choice of spicy tuna, spicy salmon $3
Thai Chili/Coconut Shrimp – served over rice $6

Special Thanks to Paul for setting up this meetup! He will serve as the contact for the night and can be reached at 609-356-4028.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Monday Happy Hour - Koji
